comment.body:
SAX2 extension to augment the entity information provided though a {@link Locator}. If an implementation supports this extension, the Locator provided in {@link org.xml.sax.ContentHandler#setDocumentLocator ContentHandler.setDocumentLocator() } will implement this interface, and the http://xml.org/sax/features/use-locator2 feature flag will have the value true.
This module, both source code and documentation, is in the Public Domain, and comes with NO WARRANTY.

XMLReader implementations are not required to support this information, and it is not part of core-only SAX2 distributions.

@since SAX 2.0 (extensions 1.1 alpha) @author David Brownell @version TBS
